verses.verse: "You shall therefore <S%H157>love<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H3605>always<s%> <S%H3117><s%> <S%H8104>keep<s%> His <S%H4931>charge,<s%> His <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> His <S%H4941>ordinances,<s%> and His <S%H4687>commandments.<s%>

"And <S%H3045>know<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> that I [am] not [speaking] with your <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> have not <S%H3045>known<s%> and <S%H834>who<s%> have not <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H4148>discipline<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> – His <S%H1433>greatness,<s%> His <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and His <S%H5186>outstretched<s%> <S%H2220>arm,<s%>

and His <S%H226>signs<s%> and His <S%H4639>works<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He <S%H6213>did<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> and to <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H776>land;<s%>

and <S%H834>what<s%> He <S%H6213>did<s%> to Egypt's <S%H2428>army,<s%> to its <S%H5483>horses<s%> and its <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> He made the <S%H4325>water<s%> of the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220><s%> <S%H3220>Sea<s%> to <S%H6687>engulf<s%> them while they were <S%H7291>pursuing<s%> you, and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5704>completely<s%> <S%H3117><s%> <S%H2088><s%> destroyed them;
and <S%H834>what<s%> He <S%H6213>did<s%> to you in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> you <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place;<s%>

and <S%H834>what<s%> He <S%H6213>did<s%> to <S%H1885>Dathan<s%> and <S%H48>Abiram,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H446>Eliab,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> when the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H6475>opened<s%> its <S%H6310>mouth<s%> and <S%H1104>swallowed<s%> them, their <S%H1004>households,<s%> their <S%H168>tents,<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3351>living<s%> <S%H3351>thing<s%> that <S%H7272>followed<s%> them, <S%H7130>among<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> –
but your own <S%H5869>eyes<s%> have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4639>work<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He <S%H6213>did.<s%>

"You shall therefore <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H4687>commandment<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I am <S%H6680>commanding<s%> you <S%H3117>today,<s%> <S%H4616>so<s%> that you may be <S%H2388>strong<s%> and <S%H935>go<s%> in and <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> into <S%H834>which<s%> you are about to <S%H5674>cross<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it;

so that you may <S%H748>prolong<s%> [your] <S%H3117>days<s%> on the <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> to your fathers to <S%H1>give<s%> to them and to their <S%H5414>descendants,<s%> a <S%H2233>land<s%> <S%H776>flowing<s%> with <S%H2100>milk<s%> and <S%H2461>honey.<s%>

"For the <S%H776>land,<s%> into <S%H834>which<s%> you are <S%H935>entering<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it, is not like the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> from <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H3318>came,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> you used to <S%H2232>sow<s%> your <S%H2233>seed<s%> and <S%H8248>water<s%> it with your <S%H7272>foot<s%> like a <S%H3419>vegetable<s%> <S%H1588>garden.<s%>

"But the <S%H776>land<s%> into <S%H834>which<s%> you are about to <S%H5674>cross<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it, a <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H2022>hills<s%> and <S%H1237>valleys,<s%> <S%H8354>drinks<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> from the <S%H4306>rain<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%>

a <S%H776>land<s%> for <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1875>cares;<s%> the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> are <S%H8548>always<s%> on it, from the <S%H7225>beginning<s%> even to the <S%H319>end<s%> of the <S%H8141>year.<s%>

"And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> about, <S%H518>if<s%> you <S%H8085>listen<s%> <S%H8085>obediently<s%> to my <S%H4687>commandments<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I am <S%H6680>commanding<s%> you <S%H3117>today,<s%> to <S%H157>love<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> and to <S%H5647>serve<s%> Him with <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H3824>heart<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H5315>soul,<s%>

that He will <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H4306>rain<s%> for your <S%H776>land<s%> in its <S%H6256>season,<s%> the <S%H3138>early<s%> and <S%H4456>late<s%> <S%H3138>rain,<s%> <S%H4456><s%> that you may <S%H622>gather<s%> in your <S%H1715>grain<s%> and your <S%H8492>new<s%> <S%H8492>wine<s%> and your <S%H3323>oil.<s%>
"And He will <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H6212>grass<s%> in your <S%H7704>fields<s%> for your <S%H929>cattle,<s%> and you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> and be <S%H7646>satisfied.<s%>

<S%H8104>"Beware,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> your <S%H3824>hearts<s%> be <S%H6601>deceived<s%> and you <S%H5493>turn<s%> <S%H5493>away<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> and <S%H7812>worship<s%> them.

"Or the <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will be <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against you, and He will <S%H6113>shut<s%> up the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> so that there will be <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4306>rain<s%> and the <S%H127>ground<s%> will not <S%H5414>yield<s%> its <S%H2981>fruit;<s%> and you will perish <S%H6>quickly<s%> from the <S%H4120>good<s%> <S%H2896>land<s%> <S%H776>which<s%> the <S%H834>Lord<s%> is <S%H3068>giving<s%> you.

"You shall therefore <S%H7760>impress<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> of mine on your <S%H3824>heart<s%> and on your <S%H5315>soul;<s%> and you shall <S%H7194>bind<s%> them as a <S%H226>sign<s%> on your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and they shall be as <S%H2903>frontals<s%> on your <S%H996>forehead.<s%> <S%H5869><s%>

"And you shall <S%H3925>teach<s%> them to your <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H1696>talking<s%> of them when you <S%H3427>sit<s%> in your <S%H1004>house<s%> and when you <S%H1980>walk<s%> along the <S%H1870>road<s%> and when you <S%H7901>lie<s%> <S%H7901>down<s%> and when you <S%H6965>rise<s%> up.
"And you shall <S%H3789>write<s%> them on the <S%H4201>doorposts<s%> of your <S%H1004>house<s%> and on your <S%H8179>gates,<s%>

<S%H4616>so<s%> that your <S%H3117>days<s%> and the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H1121>sons<s%> may be <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> on the <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> to your fathers to <S%H1>give<s%> them, as <S%H5414>long<s%> as the <S%H3117>heavens<s%> [remain] <S%H8064>above<s%> the <S%H5921>earth.<s%>

"For <S%H518>if<s%> you are <S%H8104>careful<s%> to <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4687>commandment<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I am <S%H6680>commanding<s%> you, to <S%H6213>do<s%> it, to <S%H157>love<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H1980>walk<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> His <S%H1870>ways<s%> and <S%H1692>hold<s%> <S%H1692>fast<s%> to Him;

then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H3423>drive<s%> out <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> from <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> you, and you will <S%H3423>dispossess<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H1419>greater<s%> and <S%H6099>mightier<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> you.

<S%H3605>"Every<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> on <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3709>sole<s%> of your <S%H7272>foot<s%> shall <S%H1869>tread<s%> shall be yours; your <S%H1366>border<s%> shall be from the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> to <S%H3844>Lebanon,<s%> [and] from the <S%H5104>river,<s%> the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H6578>Euphrates,<s%> as <S%H5704>far<s%> as the <S%H314>western<s%> <S%H3220>sea.<s%>

"There shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> be able to <S%H3320>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you; the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H5414>lay<s%> the <S%H6343>dread<s%> of you and the <S%H4172>fear<s%> of you on <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> on <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H1869>set<s%> <S%H1869>foot,<s%> as He has <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to you.
<S%H7200>"See,<s%> I am <S%H5414>setting<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you <S%H3117>today<s%> a <S%H1293>blessing<s%> and a curse: <S%H7045><s%>

the <S%H1293>blessing,<s%> <S%H834>if<s%> you <S%H8085>listen<s%> to the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I am <S%H6680>commanding<s%> you <S%H3117>today;<s%>

and the <S%H7045>curse,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> you do not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> but <S%H5493>turn<s%> <S%H5493>aside<s%> from the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I am <S%H6680>commanding<s%> you <S%H3117>today,<s%> by <S%H1980>following<s%> <S%H310><s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you have not <S%H3045>known.<s%>

"And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> about, <S%H3588>when<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H935>brings<s%> you into the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> you are <S%H935>entering<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it, that you shall <S%H5414>place<s%> the <S%H1293>blessing<s%> on <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H1630>Gerizim<s%> and the <S%H7045>curse<s%> on <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H9403>Ebal.<s%>

"Are they not <S%H5676>across<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> <S%H310>west<s%> of the <S%H1870>way<s%> toward the <S%H8121>sunset,<s%> <S%H3996><s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> who <S%H3427>live<s%> in the <S%H6160>Arabah,<s%> <S%H4136>opposite<s%> <S%H1537>Gilgal,<s%> <S%H681>beside<s%> the <S%H436>oaks<s%> of <S%H4176>Moreh<s%>?

"For you are about to <S%H5674>cross<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> to <S%H935>go<s%> in to <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H5414>giving<s%> you, and you shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> it and <S%H3427>live<s%> in it,

and you shall be <S%H8104>careful<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and the <S%H4941>judgments<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I am <S%H5414>setting<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you <S%H3117>today.<s%>
